description:
Satou and the gang make plans to help return the elf girl that he rescued to her home in the forest, but first they need to prepare for the long trip by learning how to rough it outdoors.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Camping Lessons That Began with a Death March
Death March kara Hajimaru Yaei Kunren
L’initiation au camping venant d’une death march
デスマーチからはじまる野営訓練
